DCS F-Droid Repo (unofficial)

This is a repository of DCS apps to be used with F-Droid. Applications in this repository are official binaries built by the original application developers.

Currently it serves 3 apps. To add it to your F-Droid app, scan the QR code (click it to enlarge) or use this link:

https://raw.githubusercontent.com/DaneChainS/fdroid/main/fdroid/repo

If you would like to manually verify the fingerprint (SHA-256) of the repository signing key, here it is:
ED 94 F4 D3 EC 29 78 A2 FC 71 70 A0 7F 25 FD B3 B3 28 04 29 8E 2F F9 FF 00 D9 F6 B7 3C 55 33 66
